text: A long, cold but lovely day marshalling cars @RiponRaces yesterday with @NYFRS_Rip who I’ve not seen 4 AGES! 😊 (& I can just about feel my toes again now)! No hats, horses or champagne but around 600 happy people getting their #COVID19 #vaccine #WednesdayMotivation #NotJustFires https://t.co/JINMsWHgu7
